inputs.name: Area of Interest
inputs.description: The BBOX you are interested in.

inputs.name: Time range
inputs.description: The time range you are interested in.

inputs.name: Output Name
inputs.description: The name of a zarr output (e.g. mycube.zarr).

inputs.name: Bucket Name
inputs.description: Optional: Name of your own S3 bucket. If Bucket Name and below bucket specifictations are not given, eurodatacube-scratch bucket is used as default.

inputs.name: The Region of a Bucket
inputs.description: Optional: Name of the S3 region of your own bucket.

inputs.name: Endpoint URL for a Bucket
inputs.description: Optional: Endpoint URL for your own bucket.

inputs.name: Bucket key
inputs.description: Optional: Key for your own bucket.

inputs.name: Bucket secret
inputs.description: Optional: Secret for your own bucket.
